snippet.title: Kawaii Slime ARENA - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Kawaii Slime Arena is now available on:

- Playstation 4 | Playstation 5: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10006413
- Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.es/Juegos/Programas-descargables-Nintendo-Switch/Kawaii-Slime-Arena-2310145.html



The Slime Invasión is here!

Help Yui defeat the slimes with powerful weapons!. Choose between lots of upgrades to make her stronger and beat the arenas to unlock all weapons!.
 
In Kawaii Slime ARENA you will take control of Yui, an adorable young girl who will have to fight against strange creatures: the slimes. 

This terrible plague that must be eliminated and the only one who will be able to confront the invasion is Yui. She will have at her disposition a big arsenal with different weapons. Use the power-ups to improve Yui’s power and kill all the slimes.

Features
- Fight against the slime menace and defeat the big bosses.
- Use a big variety of weapons to take down the invasion.
- Buy weapons, equipment and power-ups to defeat the enemy.

More information on:
https://www.jandusoft.com/kawaiislimearena
